data.sentence: The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)
The word بَلْ comes from the root ب ل and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To be possessed of or characterized by glory or honour or dignity or nobility, to be magnificent/magnified, large/abundant/much, exalted or sublime.
data.sentence: The word مَجِيدٌ comes from the root م ج د and is associated with the meanings: To be possessed of or characterized by glory or honour or dignity or nobility, to be magnificent/magnified, large/abundant/much, exalted or sublime.

data.meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
data.sentence: The word قُرْءَانٌ comes from the root ق ر ا and is associated with the meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
